Articles.Content:
I really am not sure why, but whenever I tried to land on any planet/moon, my craft just falls apart and soars around, or just crashes into the ground.

I have a video link here, skip to 3:00 for when the bug happens 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arMBXbUpAog&feature=youtu.be

i am running this on x64 bit ksp version 1.12

Edited May 27, 2016 by Charwal
